data.title: Forestry protection officers attacked, valuable rosewood logs stolen
data.description: The gang, who also disabled CCTV cameras in the area, are thought to be familiar with the area of forest in which the attack took place

data.title: PM heads to Los Angeles and Lima for a week of meetings
data.description: Thai delegation combines participation at APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting in Peruvian capital an official visit to Los Angeles

data.title: Myanmar meets less than 50% of power demand amid fuel and line disruptions
data.description: The Ministry of Electric Power has stated that only around 50% of the electricity demand can currently be generated and distributed due to the destruction of power lines, a decrease in electricity generation from natural gas plants, and ongoing maintenance efforts caused by flooding.

data.description: The Ministry of Electric Power has stated that only around 50% of the electricity demand can currently be generated and distributed due to the destruction of power lines, a decrease in electricity generation from natural gas plants, and ongoing maintenance efforts caused by flooding.

data.title: Pilot programme allowing Vietnamese to gamble in casinos extended
data.description: The Vietnamese government is extending the pilot programme to allow Vietnamese to gamble in casinos.

data.title: EV and straight-six options
data.description: The BMW M3 will return for a seventh generation with the choice of either a straight-six turbo petrol engine or a high-tech EV powertrain with huge power and unprecedented dynamic ability.

data.title: Suzuki enters EV fray with Aceman rival
data.description: Suzuki has finally unveiled its first electric car, the eVitara, becoming one of the last major car makers to enter the EV market.

data.title: Conference to explore future of AI
data.description: The Open AGI Summit, a pioneering conference exploring the intersection of artificial general intelligence and decentralised technologies, will take place at SCB Next Tech, 4th floor of Siam Paragon, Rama I Road, on Thursday from 10am to 8pm.

data.title: World Film Series ends with Romanian movie
data.description: The 2024 Contemporary World Film Series will conclude with the screening of 6.9 On The Richter Scale, at TK Park

data.title: Generational politics
data.description: Political conflicts around the world typically arise from divisions based on class, ethnicity, rural-urban disparities and caste, rather than age differences. This observation caused Asst Prof Kanokrat Lertchoosakul, lecturer at the Faculty of Political Science, Chulalongkorn University, to investigate if it is true that political conflict in Thailand is one between generations.

data.title: Music legend Quincy Jones dies at 91
data.description: Quincy Jones, the legendary record producer, composer, and arranger whose transformative influence on American music spanned more than seven decades, has passed away at 91. His publicist, Arnold Robinson, confirmed that Jones died peacefully at his Bel Air home due to complications from pneumonia.

data.description: Thailand's top badminton star Kunlavut Vitidsarn powers to his first title of 2024

data.description: Sunday was last day of five-day period to enjoy architectural alignment of temple complex with setting sun

data.description: Ministry assessing potential impact on Thailand, particularly in terms of employment

data.title: Josie Ho 'Most Intriguing Actress' at World Film Festival of Bangkok
data.description: "Playing a character who knows nothing [and] remains suspicious and terrified throughout the film was one of my greatest challenges, especially since I had already read the script and knew everything," said Josie Ho, a renowned Hong Kong actress, after the premiere of “Onpaku” (2022) at the World Film Festival of Bangkok on Saturday.

data.title: Most Thais worried by political situations, survey finds
data.description: Asked if they were worried by current political situations, 68.1% of respondents said Yes and 31.9% said No

data.description: US President-elect Trump has announced plans to negotiate with Vladimir Putin on ending Russia-Ukraine war

data.description: Chinese government is to send two new giant pandas to Thailand to mark 50th anniversary of diplomatic ties next year

data.title: Thailand ready to become a world-class blockchain hub: Prasert
data.description: Thailand has the potential to become a world-class digital hub, which could offer a lot of economic opportunities for the country, Digital Economy and Society Minister Prasert Jantararuangtong said on Saturday.

data.title: WHA Group" reports 71% YoY profit rise to THB 3,312M
data.description: “WHA Group” Reports Strong 9-Month Normalized Profit of THB 3,312 Million in 2024, Up 71% YoY; Interim Dividend of THB 0.0669 per Share Was Approved with XD Date Set for 21 November. Expect to Close Additional Data Center Deals, Reaffirming Thailand as a Key Investment Hub

data.title: Arumugam Kandasamy, Malaysian worker on 'Death Railway', dies at 97
data.description: The oldest surviving worker of the infamous 'Death Railway' between Thailand and Myanmar, Arumugam Kandasamy, has died at the age of 97.

data.title: Arumugam Kandasamy, worker on infamous 'Death Railway', dies at 97
data.description: SEREMBAN: The oldest surviving worker of the infamous 'Death Railway' between Thailand and Myanmar, Arumugam Kandasamy, has died at the age of 97.

data.title: As children face unprecedented challenges worldwide, UNICEF calls for united action towards A Better Tomorrow, Today
data.description: BANGKOK, 7 November 2024 – UNICEF Thailand today launches A Better Tomorrow, a public campaign calling on society to come together to create a safer, healthier, and more hopeful future for every child. In a world of escalating conflicts, health crises, poverty, inequality, and climate-related disasters, UNICEF is urging immediate action to uphold children’s rights and help every child reach their full potential.

data.title: Taiwan targets 'peanuts' for political motive
data.description: Mainland blasts ban on import of spicy snack popular among Taiwan residents

data.title: Myanmar Embassy in Thailand announces entry ban for overstayers based on duration of overstay
data.description: The Myanmar Embassy in Thailand announced on November 8 that overstayers in Thailand will be banned from re-entering Thailand based on the duration of overstay.
